name: SoulHai
description:
Description:
             SoulHai is a platformer game featuring the soul, Hai who’s trying to escape from Hell into the mortal world. But there’s a catch, soul Hai will need to proceed through a torturous and treacherous path filled with obstacles and enemy in order to reach the escape.

             How it is less is more? Soul Hai is a game where the lesser you move left and right, the more accurate your landing will be. Not only that, your health is also determine by how less you jump. Losing all your health will definitely cost you your soul. So, be patient and jump wisely.

Gameplay:
             Soul Hai only requires three button to play. Left key and right key to move left and right and SPACE to jump.
